Title: Chat Generative Pre-Trained Transformer (ChatGPT): Comprehending its Operational Structure, AI Techniques, Working, Features and Limitations
Abstract: chatgpt has transformed the way machines interact with humans as it is a significant improvement in the field of generative artificial intelliegence and conversational artificial intelliegence. chatgpt is a combination of generative artificial intelliegence and conversational artificial intelliegence and it is built on an underlying large language model which can create new contents similar to human generated contents and simulate human like conversations. it has the ability to understand the context of a conversation and respond accordingly and learn to adapt from user feedback. chatgpt is a new artificial intelliegence tool and is still evolving very rapidly its successive models are gradually becoming more advanced and are capable of generating highly complex coherent and credible text thus making it a valuable tool for a wide range of applications. therefore this paper will present a comprehensive study of chatgpt covering its operational structure key artificial intelliegence techniques working features and limitations. this comprehensive study will provide users a detailed insight of chatgpt in order to understand its core concepts.
